turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a golden matcha latte with 2% milk and a small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a a small golden macha latte with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: at the pizza on 1920 South Nevada Avenue in Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the peet's coffee store at 19th and south nevada.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
